messages.register_hotkey_fail: Failed to register hot key. Maybe the specified key combination has already been registered by another program, or another instance of Dead by Unicode is already running.
messages.parse_config_json_fail: Failed to parse JSON while reading configuration file.
messages.open_hkey_fail: Cannot determine if hexadecimal numpad input is enabled:  Failed to open registry key “%1”.
messages.query_reg_value_fail: Cannot determine if hexadecimal numpad input is enabled:  Failed to query key value “%1”.
messages.question_enable_hex_numpad: Looks like hexadecimal numpad input is not enabled. Enable it now?
messages.set_reg_value_success: Registry key value has been set. It will take effect after re-login.
messages.set_reg_value_fail: Failed to set registry key value.
messages.author: Author

messages.question: 提示
messages.register_hotkey_fail: 绑定热键失败，可能指定的按键组合已经被其他程序绑定。
messages.parse_config_json_fail: 读取配置文件时解析JSON失败。
messages.open_hkey_fail: 无法判断是否已启用十六进制小键盘输入: 打开注册表键“%1”失败。
messages.query_reg_value_fail: 无法判断是否已启用十六进制小键盘输入: 请求键值“%1”失败。
messages.question_enable_hex_numpad: 检测到未启用十六进制小键盘输入，是否立即设置启用？
messages.set_reg_value_success: 已写入注册表项。需要重新登录Windows账号使设置生效。
